summary: The vehicle is driving on a city street with parked cars on the right. A pedestrian suddenly appears from behind a parked car and starts crossing the street. The pedestrian is relatively close to the vehicle when first visible.
actions: The vehicle is driving straight. The driver will likely need to brake to avoid the pedestrian.

summary: A child suddenly appears from behind a parked car, directly in front of the ego vehicle. The child is very close, creating an immediate collision risk.
actions: The ego vehicle is driving straight. A child suddenly appears from behind a parked car. The driver will need to brake immediately to avoid a collision.
